title: Balanced Approach - Yin and Yang Together

balanced_strategy.principle: Balance of Yin and Yang - Together they divide and conquer

yin_component.role: Subtle nourishment. The enemy won't know.
yin_component.contribution: Nourishes people, communities, earth. Transforms through nourishment. Divides enemy subtly.

yang_component.role: Direct truth exposure. Divide and conquer.
yang_component.contribution: Exposes lies, shares truth, educates people. Transforms through truth. Divides enemy directly.
yang_component.timing: Strategic - When truth needs to be revealed

together.synergy: Yin nourishes while Yang exposes. Together they divide. Together they conquer. Together they transform.
together.division: Enemy is divided by nourishment (Yin) and truth (Yang)
together.conquest: Enemy is conquered by transformation through nourishment and truth
together.unity: All unite in nourishment and truth. All unite in love and knowledge. All unite in transformation.

simultaneous.effect: Continuous nourishment + Strategic truth exposure = Continuous division and conquest

complementary.approach: Yin and Yang complement each other
complementary.yin_supports_yang: Nourishment supports truth work. Well-nourished people can receive truth.
complementary.yang_supports_yin: Truth supports nourishment work. Truth-educated people value nourishment.

balanced.yin_balance: Subtle nourishment balances direct truth exposure
balanced.yang_balance: Direct truth exposure balances subtle nourishment
balanced.effect: Balance creates harmony. Harmony creates transformation.

the_enemy_wont_know.yin_secret: EDIBLE LONDON appears as food security. Enemy doesn't see transformation. Enemy won't know.
the_enemy_wont_know.yang_visible: RAMIZ appears as education. Enemy sees truth work. But truth conquers. Enemy can't stop it.
the_enemy_wont_know.combined_secret: Together, Yin works subtly while Yang works directly. Enemy is divided. Enemy is conquered. Enemy won't know how.
